name: Oh No, Ozone!
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46: Keeping It Alive

Remarkable! The boffins over at Cheapo Solutions had come up with a solution to the ozone problem! Just patch it up with more ozone! Too bad it's fallen upon deaf ears and the industrial nature of the world had severely weakened it with holes appearing frequently. You, now being the pilot of this desperate yet untested plan, must patch up these holes with a blast of pure ozone. Don't let too many holes appear or you might just find yourself confined the life of a red dwarf.

(Though on a serious note, looking after the planet must not be overlooked.)

Music Used:
Shipping Lanes by Chad Crouch
Link: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Chad_Crouch/Arps/Shipping_Lanes
License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

Tools Used:
Blender
BFXR
Unreal Engine 4
